member.name: T:APILibrary.Models.Todos.PostDto
member.summary: Used when creating a new post. Some properties have been simplified such as CreatedBy that ony accepts an Id instead of an User object.

member.name: P:APILibrary.Models.Todos.PostDto.Text
member.summary: A post posted by a user to the social network.
member.example: Today I took a shower and now I feel fresh!

member.name: P:APILibrary.Models.Todos.PostDto.CreatedBy
member.summary: Id of the user that is creating this post. Must be an existing user.

member.name: P:APILibrary.Models.Todos.PostDto.HasBeenEdited
member.summary: A check whether or not a post has been edited. If it has been edited, this property will always be true.

member.name: P:APILibrary.Models.Todos.PostDto.ListOfUsersThatLikedThisPost
member.summary: A List of ints of all the userId:s that have liked this post. 2,3

member.name: P:APILibrary.Models.Todos.Post.Id
member.summary: e IS unique for each post
